39907.summary: Some customers in Grand Forks and surrounding areas are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39907.title: July 23 – Grand Forks (Christina Lake, Midway) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
